pages.text: Hydrogen Chloride is needed for the $(l:block/chemical_injection_chamber)Injection Chamber$(/l), part of $(l:ore_processing/quadrupling)Ore Quadrupling$(/l). It is created by putting $(l:gas/chlorine)Chlorine$(/l) and $(l:gas/hydrogen)Hydrogen$(/l) in a $(l:block/chemical_infuser)Chemical Infuser$(/l).
